com.craftar
Class CraftARItemAR

java.lang.Object
  com.craftar.CraftARItem
      com.craftar.CraftARItemAR
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Parcelable
public class CraftARItemAR
extends CraftARItem

CraftARItem that handles an Augmented Reality experience. It may contain one or more instances of CraftARTrackingContent

Constructor Detail

CraftARItemAR

public CraftARItemAR(org.json.JSONObject object)
              throws CraftARSDKException
Creates a CraftARItemAR from a jsonObject representing this ARItem. An ARItem is a CraftARItem that holds the necessary information to track the reference image and display contents on top of it as part of an AR experience.

Throws:
CraftARSDKException
Method Detail

setContentFactory

public static void setContentFactory(CraftARTrackingContentFactory contentFactory)
Factory used to create the AR contents for the item when parsed from the JSON object.

addContent

public void addContent(CraftARTrackingContent content)
Add a CraftARTrackingContent to this CraftARItemAR. The contents are usually defined online using the Content Creator http://catchoom.com/product/craftar-augmented-reality-image-recognition/#. Contents can also be created locally and set to the ARItems.

removeContent

public void removeContent(CraftARTrackingContent content)
Remove a CraftARTrackingContent from this CraftARItemAR.

clearContents

public void clearContents()
Remove all the contents from this CraftARItemAR.

getContents

public java.util.ArrayList<CraftARTrackingContent> getContents()
Returns a list with all the contents attached to this CraftARItemAR

getItemTranslation

public float[] getItemTranslation()
Get the item's translation relative to the center of the viewpoint the pose of the item is updated when the item is detected by the tracking.

Returns:
3x1 translation vector

getItemRotation

public float[] getItemRotation()
Get item's rotation relative to the center projection plane the pose of the item is updated when the item is detected by the tracking.

Returns:
3x3 rotation matrix

setItemTranslation

public void setItemTranslation(float[] translation)
Set item translation relative to the center projection plane the pose of the item is updated when the item is detected by the tracking.

Parameters:
translation - 3x1 translation vector

setItemRotation

public void setItemRotation(float[] rotation)
Set item rotation relative to the center projection plane the pose of the item is updated when the item is detected by the tracking.

Parameters:
rotation - 4x4 homogeneous rotation matrix

drawsOffTracking

public boolean drawsOffTracking()
